snippet: Irving, a budding superstar with the Cavaliers, cannot become an unrestricted free agent until 2016, but that has not prevented a segment of the population from voicing concern.
abstract: Kyrie Irving, Cleveland Cavaliers budding superstar point guard, cannot become an unrestricted free agent until 2016, but that has not prevented a segment of the population, still stinging from the loss of LeBron James, from voicing concern about his possible departure.
lead_paragraph: Irving, a budding superstar with the Cavaliers, cannot become an unrestricted free agent until 2016, but that has not prevented a segment of the population from voicing concern.

headline.main: Kyrie Irving: Will He Stay or Will He Go?
headline.print_headline: Stung by Memories of James, Cleveland Fans Dread a Looming Decision by Irving
